description:
Fumi and Dad go to a parent & child cooking class. Fumi is upset, saying she wished Mom was there, when she becomes enchanted by a kind college student. She is completely infatuated and when Mom sees this... During a parent-child day of picking up trash at the park, Bunji plays with Ma and doesn`t pick up trash at all. Along the way, he becomes enchanted by a kind high school girl. He is completely infatuated, but... Bunji is playing with tadpoles. Suddenly the tadpole Bunji has starts to grow. But he doesn`t eat anything and Bunji gets worried... Mom and Dad get into a fight over something trivial. Mom ignores everything Dad says and doesn`t respond to his questions. He realizes that he is helpless without Mom while in the house...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: First Love... Fumi / First Love... Bunji / Tadpoles Hopping / Couple Love
初恋..., ふみ / 初恋..., ぶんじ / おたまぴょん / 夫婦愛
